https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/md6LdedbfAdBYPaOByW8kXEuTMb.jpg Magali, forty-something, is a winemaker and a widow: she loves her work but feels lonely. Her friends Rosine and Isabelle both want secretly to find a husband for Magali. An Autumn Tale
